title: Excellent range with good quality
review: This place has an excellent range of products varying from handicrafts to printed ones. Quality is one of the best in category. I recommend this place for everyone. Would love to visit again.

title: Good prices
review: Choose carefully and take your time you will find small treasure to remember your journey.They have lots of handmade stuff and by buying from them you support the local handicraft centers

title: Fair Selection
review: My review will not say that this shop is excellent or outstanding. I have visited many shops of this type throughout Pushkar and other places in India and feel this shop is average. Average selection, average prices, average assistance from staff. As always when shopping anywhere, check prices with competitors and negotiate accordingly.

title: Reasonable  prices with good quality
review: Shop is in middle of the market you can have trust on the staff.100% good quality with nice handmade products.i had enjoyed my shopping.i bought  here carpet,mandala,cushion,scarves.

title: Affordable deals and nice products
review: Shiva cloth store is must visiting store in pushkar.prices are so affordable and nice products.helping with all kind of needs. And I really enjoyed and had a good time here.

title: Unique Collection and Affordable prices
review: A must visit store in pushkar,Shiva Cloth Store has a unique collection in handicrafts which are so nicely finished to give you a real feel of rajasthan. What I liked the most is the collection of bags and cushion covers there.

title: Very good
review: I was very pleased by the service and the products. They helped me a lot with all kinds of stuff and I felt good buying there.

title: Nice Shop
review: This is a very nice place to shop for cloths. The rates are very cheap the service is also very good at this shop.

title: Good business with Shiva and the shop!
review: Had a pleasant experience in purchasing many items at Shivas Clothing Store, giving us good prices and deals. Shiva himself is absolute legend and looked after us very well, we felt comfortable there and went back regularly to throughout our stay in pushkar to visit! The arrangements to send stuff to to Australia were very good and affordable. Thanks Shiva and crew !

title: Best handicrafts
review: I had been there for shopping it's a good place for buying scarves bedspreads Tapestries cushions etc. Staff is nice and prices are reasonable.

title: Cool threads
review: There are a bunch of stores in Pushkar selling similar clothes for Israeli backpackers. This one is nice and so are the staff.

title: Shopping...
review: A great collection of local stuff, specially of bags and towels...beware of local shopekeepers and ensure you check and bargain wherever possible.

title: Best handicrafts in Pushkar
review: Best handicrafts shop in Pushkar with a reasonable price and owned by a good person they also helped me to buy other stuff from Pushkar at a good price.

title: nice products and friendly staff
review: 100% recomendable for the quality and the staff. They have many different products with nice designed.
